title: Keep app name fixed as “Mobile Receipt” across all pages

requirements.text: Ensure the application name is consistently displayed as exactly “Mobile Receipt” across all pages and layouts by centralizing the app name in a single frontend constant and reusing it wherever the app name is rendered (e.g., Start page heading, navigation brand text, footer copyright text, logo alt text, and document/tab title).

quotes: Don't change app name. Keep it consistent in all pages. Name:- Mobile Receipt

acceptanceCriteria: All visible app-brand text in the UI matches exactly “Mobile Receipt” (including Start page, mobile/desktop nav brand, and footer).
The HTML document <title> remains “Mobile Receipt” after navigation between routes.
There is a single source of truth (one exported constant) for the app name used by the above UI locations, rather than repeated hard-coded strings.

constraints: Do not change the app name; it must remain exactly “Mobile Receipt”.
Do not edit files under frontend/src/components/ui (read-only).
Respect the existing routing/layout structure; only adjust app-name rendering/usage.
nonGoals: Renaming routes, features, or changing any business logic/sync behavior.
Rebranding or changing logos/visual identity beyond app-name text consistency.
